data.enText: not changing in your attitudes or aims
He remained steadfast in his determination to bring the killers to justice.
data.chText: 他要将杀人凶手绳之以法的决心一直没有动摇。

tr: firm and dependable especially in loyalty
example: a staunch defender of free speech

tr: marked by firm determination or resolution

example.ex: He remained steadfast in his belief that he had done the right thing.
example.tran: 他一直坚信自己做得对。

value.def: If someone is steadfast in something that they are doing, they are convinced that what they are doing is right and they refuse to change it or to give up.
value.tran: 坚定的;坚信的;坚贞不渝的

example.ex: She steadfastly refused to look his way.
example.tran: 她坚决拒绝朝他那边看。

example.ex: By now the government was well aware of the steadfastness and strength of his resistance.
example.tran: 此刻政府已经清楚地意识到他的反抗是何等的坚定有力。
